title: 18 Riot Points
body:
Ok so here's the deal, I've my eyes on the new kai'sa skin ever sense in came out on the PBE and I plane on buying it when it comes out. However, the problem is I am 18 rp short of 1350 and i dont want to buy more yet when im that close to getting the skin. Is there anything I can do for you riot?
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
